body:
I have a mon that comes up fine, works for about an hour, and then starts going into a pod restart loop with this failure message:

```
2017-10-20 14:10:20.969256 I | rook-ceph-mon7: 2017-10-20 14:10:20.969113 7f6db2977700  0 log_channel(cluster) log [DBG] : fsmap 
2017-10-20 14:10:20.969269 I | rook-ceph-mon7: 2017-10-20 14:10:20.969179 7f6db2977700  0 log_channel(cluster) log [DBG] : osdmap e3605: 6 total, 6 up, 6 in
2017-10-20 14:10:20.969363 I | rook-ceph-mon7: 2017-10-20 14:10:20.969323 7f6db2977700  0 log_channel(cluster) log [DBG] : mgrmap e82344: rook-ceph-mgr1(active), standbys: rook-ceph-mgr0
2017-10-20 14:10:21.235458 I | rook-ceph-mon7: 2017-10-20 14:10:20.372585 mon.rook-ceph-mon7 mon.0 10.233.16.179:6790/0 1 : cluster [INF] mon.rook-ceph-mon7 calling new monitor election
2017-10-20 14:10:21.235489 I | rook-ceph-mon7: 2017-10-20 14:10:20.449004 mon.rook-ceph-mon7 mon.0 10.233.16.179:6790/0 2 : cluster [INF] mon.rook-ceph-mon7 calling new monitor election
2017-10-20 14:10:21.235498 I | rook-ceph-mon7: 2017-10-20 14:10:20.556874 mon.rook-ceph-mon7 mon.0 10.233.16.179:6790/0 3 : cluster [INF] mon.rook-ceph-mon7@0 won leader election with quorum 0,1,2
2017-10-20 14:10:21.235506 I | rook-ceph-mon7: 2017-10-20 14:10:20.587119 mon.rook-ceph-mon7 mon.0 10.233.16.179:6790/0 4 : cluster [WRN] overall HEALTH_WARN 1/3 mons down, quorum rook-ceph-mon3,rook-ceph-mon4
2017-10-20 14:10:21.235513 I | rook-ceph-mon7: 2017-10-20 14:10:20.617374 mon.rook-ceph-mon7 mon.0 10.233.16.179:6790/0 5 : cluster [INF] mon.1 10.233.28.73:6790/0 
2017-10-20 14:10:21.235519 I | rook-ceph-mon7: 2017-10-20 14:10:20.947713 mon.rook-ceph-mon7 mon.0 10.233.16.179:6790/0 6 : cluster [INF] mon.2 10.233.42.161:6790/0 
2017-10-20 14:10:21.235526 I | rook-ceph-mon7: 2017-10-20 14:10:20.969074 mon.rook-ceph-mon7 mon.0 10.233.16.179:6790/0 7 : cluster [INF] monmap e13: 3 mons at {rook-ceph-mon3=10.233.28.73:6790/0,rook-ceph-mon4=10.233.42.161:6790/0,rook-ceph-mon7=10.233.16.179:6790/0}
2017-10-20 14:10:22.336560 I | rook-ceph-mon7: 2017-10-20 14:10:20.402429 mon.rook-ceph-mon4 mon.2 10.233.42.161:6790/0 15768 : cluster [INF] mon.rook-ceph-mon4 calling new monitor election
2017-10-20 14:10:22.336590 I | rook-ceph-mon7: 2017-10-20 14:10:20.402483 mon.rook-ceph-mon3 mon.1 10.233.28.73:6790/0 35406 : cluster [INF] mon.rook-ceph-mon3 calling new monitor election
2017-10-20 14:10:25.203326 I | rook-ceph-mon7: 2017-10-20 14:10:25.202997 7f6db517c700  0 log_channel(cluster) log [INF] : Health check cleared: MON_DOWN (was: 1/3 mons down, quorum rook-ceph-mon3,rook-ceph-mon4)
2017-10-20 14:10:25.203355 I | rook-ceph-mon7: 2017-10-20 14:10:25.203049 7f6db517c700  0 log_channel(cluster) log [INF] : Cluster is now healthy
2017-10-20 14:10:25.562598 I | rook-ceph-mon7: 2017-10-20 14:10:25.203005 mon.rook-ceph-mon7 mon.0 10.233.16.179:6790/0 11 : cluster [INF] Health check cleared: MON_DOWN (was: 1/3 mons down, quorum rook-ceph-mon3,rook-ceph-mon4)
2017-10-20 14:10:25.562619 I | rook-ceph-mon7: 2017-10-20 14:10:25.203050 mon.rook-ceph-mon7 mon.0 10.233.16.179:6790/0 12 : cluster [INF] Cluster is now healthy
2017-10-20 14:11:16.465736 I | rook-ceph-mon7: 2017-10-20 14:11:16.465571 7f6db2977700  0 mon.rook-ceph-mon7@0(leader) e13 handle_command mon_command({"prefix": "osd perf", "format": "json"} v 0) v1
2017-10-20 14:11:16.465778 I | rook-ceph-mon7: 2017-10-20 14:11:16.465634 7f6db2977700  0 log_channel(audit) log [DBG] : from='client.? 10.233.75.13:0/416791523' entity='client.admin' cmd=[{"prefix": "osd perf", "format": "json"}]: dispatch
2017-10-20 14:11:16.537504 I | rook-ceph-mon7: 2017-10-20 14:10:20.183070 7f6dbe3b2f40 -1 mon.rook-ceph-mon7@-1(probing).mgr e82344 Failed to load mgr commands: (2) No such file or directory
failed to run mon. failed to start mon: failed to run ceph-mon: Failed to complete rook-ceph-mon7: signal: aborted (core dumped)
```

The other two mons in my cluster are fine.
title: Enable Ceph Prometheus metrics on MGRs
